allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-core CPU allocation test results

Add comprehensive test demonstrating that Redis cannot utilize multiple CPU cores despite allocation. Test confirms single-threaded architecture.

Changes:
- Add MULTI_CORE_TEST.md with detailed 2-core allocation test results
- Update docker-compose.yml to allocate 2 CPU cores to Redis
- Include empirical CPU measurements showing ~100% usage (1 core) despite 2 cores available

Key findings:
- CPU usage remained at ~100% with 2 cores allocated (vs ~100% with 1 core)
- No performance improvement observed
- Definitively proves Redis single-threaded bottleneck
- Second CPU core completely unused during heavy load

Test methodology:
- 10 concurrent benchmark processes
- 15 CPU samples during sustained load
- Average CPU: 100.6% (only 1 core utilized)

)")
